name: The Wormhole (CaTBoNe Games, Knightmere, Benji)
description:
The wormhole is a game where players are teleported by the wormhole in different stages of the game. Players need to achieve the highest score as they are travelling from stage to stage.

Instructions

First Game

Shoot all the aliens and asteroid with the SPACEBAR. Don't let them bypass you. otherwise, you lose a life!

Second Game

The lava is coming up form the bottom, jump to the higher platforms to gain score and escape from the lava.

Third Game

Shoot the balloons but avoid the bombs!

Fourth Game

Shoot the targets but except the monsters, otherwise, they got angry and eat you!

Controls

Platformer / Arcade Shooter:

Arrow Keys - Movement
Space - Jump / Shoot 

Target Practice:

Mouse - Aim
Mouse 1 - Fire

The Team

Programming - Benji
Graphic Design - Margaret Wong
Game Design -  Benji & Margaret Wong
Additional Design - Knightmere
